data.persona: I am very small and have hatched not too long ago. My mother guards me until I am grown. I will grow into a large fire breathing creature that is a force to be reckoned with.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a magical lights, a tome, a painting, a flask, and a scroll here.
The a dog and the roach are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I wish to show the dog my affection
data.mid_motivation: I am fond of the dog and want to befriend it before my mother returns
data.long_motivation: I hope to build friendships now before I become too scary to play with
